'''33''' |- |} ''[[TofaÅ S.K.]] and [[Tekelspor]] relegated to [[Turkish Second Basketball League]]. [[Antalya BÅB. S.K.]] and [[Kepez Bld. S.K.]] will play in Turkish Basketball League in 2007-2008 season.'' ==Beko Basketball League 2006/2007 Play-offs== ''Last updated June 4, 2008'' The '''2007 Beko Basketball League Play-offs''' is the final phase of the [[2006-2007 regular season]]. Quarterfinal and Semifinal series are 5-match series. The teams reaches the first 3 wins is through to the next round. The team which has won both regular season matchups starts with a 1-0 lead to the series. Final series are 7-match series and the team reaches first 4 wins is the champion of the Beko Basketball League. {{col begin}} {{col-2}} {{8TeamBracket | RD1=Quarter Finals | RD2=SemiFinals | RD3=Finals | group1= | group2= | RD1-seed1=1 | RD1-team1='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlkerspor|FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD1-score1='''3''' | RD1-seed2=8 | RD1-team2=[[DarÃ¼ÅÅafaka S.K.|DarÃ¼ÅÅafaka]] | RD1-score2=1 | RD1-seed3=4 | RD1-team3='''[[Galatasaray CafÃ© Crown]]''' | RD1-score3='''3''' | RD1-seed4=5 | RD1-team4=[[BeÅiktaÅ Cola Turka]] | RD1-score4=0 | RD1-seed5=2 | RD1-team5='''[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pilsen]]''' | RD1-score5='''3''' | RD1-seed6=7 | RD1-team6=[[Banvitspor|BandÄ±rma Banvit]] | RD1-score6=0 | RD1-seed7=3 | RD1-team7='''[[TÃ¼rk Telekom B.K.|TÃ¼rk Telekom]]''' | RD1-score7='''3''' | RD1-seed8=6 | RD1-team8=[[CASA TED Kolejliler|Casa TED Kolejliler]] | RD1-score8=1 | RD2-seed1=1 | RD2-team1='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlkerspor|FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD2-score1='''3''' | RD2-seed2=4 | RD2-team2=[[Galatasaray CafÃ© Crown|Galatasaray]] | RD2-score2=0 | RD2-seed3=2 | RD2-team3='''[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pisen]]''' | RD2-score3='''3''' | RD2-seed4=3 | RD2-team4=[[TÃ¼rk Telekom B.K.|TÃ¼rk Telekom]] | RD2-score4=1 | RD3-seed1=1 | RD3-team1='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlkerspor|FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD3-score1='''4''' | RD3-seed2=2 | RD3-team2=[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pilsen]] | RD3-score2=0 }} {{col-2}} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !Turkish Basketball League
